item.title: Movies worth watching
item.description: Below you’ll find some movies that I particularly like. Some of the them are available on Amazon Prime Video or mubi.com . AFAIK most of the titles below are not available on Netflix. Great movie lists If you looking for something interesting to watch have a look at those lists: iMDB: Top 250 iMDB: Top 100 Greatest Movies of All Time (The Ultimate List) iMDB: Top 50 spanish movies MUBI: Top 1000 MUBI: 30 must see Japanese film classics MUBI: Top 50 Japanese films MUBI: Top Indian films Movie log Last and First Men, by Jóhann Jóhannsson, 2020 drama, science fiction Iceland My rating: Zack Snyder's Justice League, by Zack Snyder, 2021 action, adventure, fantasy, science fiction United States of America My rating: Mortal Kombat, by Simon McQuoid, 2021 fantasy, action, adventure, science fiction, thriller Australia, United States of America My rating: The White Tiger, by Ramin Bahrani, 2021 crime, drama India, Singapore, United States of America My rating: Dark Web: Cicada 3301, by Alan Ritchson, 2021 thriller, action, comedy United States of America My rating: Silk Road, by Tiller Russell, 2021 crime, thriller, drama United States of America My rating: The Mauritanian, by Kevin Macdonald, 2021 drama, thriller United Kingdom, United States of America My rating: Red Dot, by Alain Darborg, 2021 thriller, drama, horror Sweden My rating: Judas and the Black Messiah, by Shaka King, 2021 drama, history United States of America My rating: Below Zero, by Lluís Quílez (orig.
